rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 50 or more life, you win the game.
At the beginning of each end step, you gain life equal to twice the amount of life you lost this turn.
notes:
Whenever you attack, remove all counters from all attacking creatures, then sacrifice all attacking tokens. Create a tapped and attacking 1/1 white Citizen creature token for each counter removed this way, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control for each token sacrificed this way.

In case of emergency:
You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game unless a creature dealt damage to you this turn.
